description:
Take your happiness into your own hands. Learn to let go of the negative stuff and focus on things that take you forward. Practical tools, hacks and habits from positive psychology to live with passion and love your life.

This inspiring course includes:

  • Motivational lectures with practical tips and ideas.
  • Video instructions for Walking meditation and Sun salutation exercises.
  • Guided visualization for creating your future.
  • Printable worksheets: Passion Canvas & goalsetting tool.
  • Inspirational videos for uplifting your mind.

We focus on 4 areas:

  1. Developing and clarifying your passions and strengths.
  2. Living happier with 7 Happy Habits.
  3. Waking up awesome and activating your creative flow state.
  4. Mastering your emotions and developing mental clarity.

Take this course if you want to create more creative drive & energy and lasting happiness & enthusiasm in life. Let your inner awesomeness shine out. Rise in Love with Life!
title: Develop Creative & Happy Mindset - Rise in Love with Life
